seg-source.mrk: SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE system procedure

target.mrk: SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE system procedure

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE</codeph> system procedure disables the log archive mode and deletes any existing online archived log files if the <codeph>DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES</codeph> input parameter is non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE</codeph> system procedure disables the log archive mode and deletes any existing online archived log files if the <codeph>DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES</codeph> input parameter is non-zero.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE</codeph> system procedure disables the log archive mode and deletes any existing online archived log files if the <codeph>DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES</codeph> input parameter is non-zero.

trans-unit.source: See "Roll-forward recovery" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

seg-source.mrk: See "Roll-forward recovery" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

target.mrk: See "Roll-forward recovery" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(IN SMALLINT DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES)

target.mrk: SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(IN SMALLINT DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES)

trans-unit.source: No result is returned from the procedure.

seg-source.mrk: No result is returned from the procedure.

target.mrk: No result is returned from the procedure.

seg-source.mrk: DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES

target.mrk: DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES

trans-unit.source: If the input parameter value for the DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES parameter is a non-zero value, then all existing online archived log files are deleted. If the parameter value is zero, then existing online archived log files are not deleted.

seg-source.mrk: If the input parameter value for the DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES parameter is a non-zero value, then all existing online archived log files are deleted.
If the parameter value is zero, then existing online archived log files are not deleted.

target.mrk: If the input parameter value for the DELETE_ARCHIVED_LOG_FILES parameter is a non-zero value, then all existing online archived log files are deleted.
If the parameter value is zero, then existing online archived log files are not deleted.

seg-source.mrk: Execute privileges

target.mrk: Execute privileges

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: JDBC example

target.mrk: JDBC example

trans-unit.source: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files.

seg-source.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files.

target.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files.

trans-unit.source: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(?)"); cs.setInt(1, 1); cs.execute(); cs.close();

seg-source.mrk: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(?)"); cs.setInt(1, 1); cs.execute(); cs.close();

target.mrk: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(?)"); cs.setInt(1, 1); cs.execute(); cs.close();

seg-source.mrk: SQL examples

target.mrk: SQL examples

trans-unit.source: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and retains any existing log archive files:

seg-source.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and retains any existing log archive files:

target.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and retains any existing log archive files:

seg-source.mrk: CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(0);

target.mrk: CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(0);

trans-unit.source: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files:

seg-source.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files:

target.mrk: The following example disables log archive mode for the database and deletes any existing log archive files:

seg-source.mrk: CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(1);

target.mrk: CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_DISABLE_LOG_ARCHIVE_MODE(1);
